mapper.insert: insert into `order`(product_id, product_num, price, buyer_id, seller_id, buyer_addr, seller_addr, logistic_id,order_time); values(#{productId}, #{productNum}, #{price}, #{buyerId}, #{sellerId}, #{buyerAddr}, #{sellerAddr}, #{logisticId},#{order_time})
mapper.select: select `status` as status from `order` where order_id = #{orderId}
